title.narrative: Juvenile Restorative Justice Program Enhancement in Colombia

description.narrative: In view of the need to continue strengthening juvenile restorative justice processes (PJJR in Spanish) in Colombia and considering that this is the core area of the System of Criminal Liability for Adolescents (SRPA in Spanish), this project aims to contribute to the strengthening of the PJJR by expanding its coverage and using new tools and approaches for its optimization, leading to the construction of a proposal for a National Policy on Restorative Juvenile Justice. Additionally, the work with the SRPA will focus on strengthening the human rights component in the Ministry of Justice through the development of a catalog and monitoring system designed to guarantee the human rights of adolescents and young people in the SRPA by facilitating and strengthening monitoring processes. The implementation of the project follows the following lines of action: strengthening the Juvenile Restorative Justice Program in the targeted municipalities; and the development of strategies to strengthen the human rights approach in the System of Criminal Responsibilities for Adolescents.
